cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.DS. 

The paper is about using reinforcement learning to train neural networks for offline ranking in information retrieval (IR). This topic falls under the sub-category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also discusses the use of deep learning models and policy gradient algorithms, which are relevant to the sub-categories of Machine Learning (cs.LG), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS). Additionally, the paper mentions the evaluation of the method on datasets related to web search and question answering, which are tasks commonly studied in the sub-category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL).
